about_the_game:
Hovering Lands is a survival game with Rougelite elements.

More than 1000 years have passed since the global catastrophe. Nobody remembers why it happened. Humanity has long disappeared, and all the lands were swallowed up by the poisoned ocean.
Thanks to the Guardians, life continues to exist on the Hovering Lands, but for how long? Now the time has come for man to reappear in these parts. How will they meet him in the new world and what role will he play in everything that happens?

  • Explore a post-apocalyptic world full of mysteries and its inhabitants.
  • Equip your territory and start the revival of mankind.
  • Find all the ancient artifacts and discover the secret of the events that happened 1000 years ago.
  • Mine resources and develop your skills to become an invincible hero able to penetrate the most dangerous corners of the world on the Hovering Lands.
